champ_0010_chairman_01:
Very well, Champion Nemona. I trust you to
handle this in my stead.[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0010_rival_00:
Sure thing! You can count on me. In fact, I bet
this is gonna be fun![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_chairman_02: I’m glad to hear it. Good day, then.[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0010_rival_16a:
Piqued your interest, huh? That lady is...
Well, they call her La Primera!\c
She’s strong, she can do pretty much anything,
she’s got cool practically coming out her ears...\c
She’s basically everything I wanna be—or that
any Pokémon Trainer would wanna be, really![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_16b:
Good eye! She sure is! That lady is... Well, they
call her La Primera!\c
She’s strong, she can do pretty much anything,
she’s got cool practically coming out her ears...\c
She’s basically everything I wanna be—or that
any Pokémon Trainer would wanna be, really![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_17:
Oh! Which reminds me! Remember in homeroom
when I asked what your dream is?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_02a:
Now, I know you said you’re all about completing
the Pokédex! But hear me out...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_02b:
Well, since your heart’s already set on becoming
a really strong Trainer...I’ve got an idea for you![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_02c:
If you’re still trying to decide what it is you’re
looking for...I’ve got an idea for you![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_03: You should try to reach [VAR COLOR(0006)]Champion Rank[VAR COLOR(0000)] like me![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_04a:
Oh wow! Hang on, though—I’ve got a whole spiel
I wanna give you. Here goes...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_04b:
Aww, but talent like yours deserves to be used!
Hear me out...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_05:
The Trainers who reach Champion Rank are the
ones who raise their Pokémon really strong.\c
They’re pro-tier battlers. Their moves keep
crowds absolutely on the edge of their seats![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_06:
You have to prove yourself to the Pokémon
League to officially get the title of Champion.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_07:
And to do that, you have to do more than just
take classes here.\c
You’ve got to take on eight Pokémon Gyms and
win so you can collect their Gym Badges![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_08:
Once you’ve done all that, all that’s left is a
special test—the Champion Assessment.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_09:
And once you pass THAT, then at long last you’ll
be a Champion![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_10:
It’s every Pokémon Trainer’s dream! The coolest
title anyone could ever hope to get!\c
Not to brag or anything![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_11:
I reached Champion Rank during our last
Treasure Hunt, you know![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_16:
Oh, the Treasure Hunt is a special independent
study thing we’ve got here. Should happen soon!\c
Our last one started not long after the beginning
of this school year![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_12:
It’s great! You get to leave school to go have an
adventure and learn however you want![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_13:
I guess you could say my journey to becoming
a Champion was the treasure I found...maybe?\r
I dunno yet if that’s the answer I’m looking for...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_14:
Anyway, I’ve got a feeling I’d be able to get even
stronger if you and I were both working at it...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0010_rival_18:
Lemme go ahead and save the Gyms’ locations in
your map app in case you decide to go for it![VAR 0114(0004)]
